channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- API Connect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- API Connect

item.title: CVE-2023-28522|2023-05-12T01:22:58.543Z -- ibm -- api%20connect
item.description: IBM API Connect V10 could allow an authenticated user to perform actions that they should not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 250585.

item.title: CVE-2023-47722|2023-12-09T02:32:57.775Z -- ibm -- api%20connect
item.description: IBM API Connect V10.0.5.3 and V10.0.6.0 stores user credentials in browser cache which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 271912.
